about_the_game:
Your Fight. Your Story. Your Battlegrounds.

Survivor Pass: Badlands

Style matters more than ever as players jump and drift around the “A La Muerte Vamos” racing circuit running through Miramar’s badlands.

All players who drop in during the 12 weeks of Survivor Pass: Badlands have a chance to unlock the “Badlands Royalty” Racing Stripe Mirado and more through community challenges. Picking up the premium Survivor Pass: Badlands takes you even deeper into the battleground’s history, offering more than 90 rewards for completing missions and challenges as you level up.


How long is Season 5?
PUBG Season 5 will run for 12 weeks in total.
• PC : October 23, 2019 (00:30 AM PDT) ~ January 14, 2020 (17:30 PM PDT)


How many missions are available in Survivor Pass: Badlands?
Season 5, as a whole, features more than 400 total missions. With Survivor Pass: Badlands, players have access to 252 Daily Missions, 84 Weekly Missions, 12 Season Missions, and 49 Progression Missions. And there will be a series of 37 Challenge Missions tied to specific weapons that are only available to premium survivor pass holders. Plus, the story of Miramar will be revealed as Community Missions are completed .

When are Weekly Missions updated?
PC - Weekly Missions are reset on Tuesdays at 19:00 PM PDT


What if I buy the premium Survivor Pass: Badlands late in the season?
You will immediately receive all Premium rewards up to your current level and will have until the end of Season 5 to earn the rest of your rewards. Level Packs can also be purchased to accelerate your progress if time is running short."

name: Survivor Pass: Badlands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 2GB / AMD Radeon R7 370 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB / AMD Radeon RX 580 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS on Steam in order to play.
supported_languages: English, Korean, Simplified Chinese, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Thai, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Traditional Chinese, Ukrainian
